programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio', about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: A mother leans on her horn at the wrong time, to the wrong guy. Road rage doesn't begin to describe what he's about to do to her and everyone she knows.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Liberty's head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A group of misguided animal rights activists free a caged chimp infected with the 'Rage' virus from a medical research lab. When London bike courier Jim wakes up from a coma a month after, he finds his city all but deserted. On the run from the zombie-like victims of the Rage, Jim stumbles upon a group of survivors, including Selena and cab driver Frank, and joins them on a perilous journey to what he hopes will be safety.

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: The T-virus unleashed by the evil Umbrella Corporation has spread to every corner of the globe, infesting the planet with zombies, demons and monsters. Alice, a former Umbrella employee turned rogue warrior, joins her friends on a last-chance mission to storm the company's headquarters located deep underneath what used to be Raccoon City. But the Red Queen knows that Alice is coming, and the final battle will determine if the rest of mankind lives or dies.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower man's mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: A mother leans on her horn at the wrong time, to the wrong guy. Road rage doesn't begin to describe what he's about to do to her and everyone she knows.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: A tech blogger unleashes the power of a time-altering device to rewrite the past and seek revenge against the ruthless corporate empire that destroyed his family.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Dr Ryan Stone and Matt Kowalsky are stranded in space with no way to contact Earth after their shuttle is destroyed in the midst of a routine space walk.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Ford Brody, a Navy bomb expert, has just reunited with his family in San Francisco, only to be forced to go to Japan to help his estranged father, Joe. Soon, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to combat malevolent adversaries that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake as they make their way towards their final battleground back in San Francisco.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owner's payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Men In Black Films
programme.desc: It is time to protect the Earth from the scum of the universe as we walk through how to join the Men in Black, learning from agents Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, and more.

programme.title: Friendship's Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Dr Ryan Stone and Matt Kowalsky are stranded in space with no way to contact Earth after their shuttle is destroyed in the midst of a routine space walk.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Ford Brody, a Navy bomb expert, has just reunited with his family in San Francisco, only to be forced to go to Japan to help his estranged father, Joe. Soon, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to combat malevolent adversaries that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake as they make their way towards their final battleground back in San Francisco.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the show's opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owner's payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.title: Friendship's Death
programme.desc: A British reporter meets female robot Friendship, who has been sent from another planet to war-torn 1970 Jordan.

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Rome's Colosseum explodes, London's pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planet's core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earth's engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up

Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

programme.title: The Price Is Right
programme.desc: "Come on down!" "The Price Is Right" -- hosted by Bob Barker until 2007 and Drew Carey thereafter -- features a wide variety of games and contests with the same basic challenge: Guess the prices of everyday (or not-quite-everyday) retail items. Four contestants, all of whom are seated in one of the wildest audiences in daytime game-show history, are called to the stage to play a preliminary pricing round. That winner joins the host on stage for one of more than 70 different pricing games. After three such games, the contestants spin a big wheel -- hoping to get as close to $1 as possible -- in the "Showcase Showdown." The two highest winners of that round advance to the final, where prizes could be cars or roomsful of furniture. A trio of models presents the prizes.

Four contestants, all of whom are seated in one of the wildest audiences in daytime game-show history, are called to the stage to play a preliminary pricing round. That winner joins the host on stage for one of more than 70 different pricing games. After three such games, the contestants spin a big wheel -- hoping to get as close to $1 as possible -- in the "Showcase Showdown." The two highest winners of that round advance to the final, where prizes could be cars or roomsful of furniture. A trio of models presents the prizes.

programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: When Trojan prince Paris woos Helen, Queen of Sparta, away from her husband Menelaus, the legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Primatologist Davis Okoye shares an unshakable bond with George, an extraordinarily intelligent silverback gorilla that's been in his care since birth. When a genetic experiment goes wrong, it causes George, a wolf and a reptile to grow to a monstrous size. As the mutated beasts embark on a path of destruction, Okoye teams up with a discredited genetic engineer and the military to secure an antidote and prevent a global catastrophe.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: One man's brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after it's revealed he's a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: After showing signs of clairvoyance, New York City paramedic Cassandra Webb must confront revelations about her past and protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the death of his friend, Bobby decides to leave the army, but he is soon asked to come back into action in order to help prevent the assassination of the President.

programme.title: Old Guy
programme.desc: An ageing hit man must train a young prodigy when his employer moves to replace the old guard. However, when they learn they are being betrayed, the unlikely pair turns into a lethal team, with their double-crossing bosses in their sights.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that they're the ones being hunted.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, is the last Gunslinger standing. He has a grave responsibility, it is up to him to prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Old Guy
programme.desc: An ageing hit man must train a young prodigy when his employer moves to replace the old guard. However, when they learn they are being betrayed, the unlikely pair turns into a lethal team, with their double-crossing bosses in their sights.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, rescue diver Jonas Taylor must save the crew and the ocean itself from an unimaginable threat: a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the megalodon.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richard's throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, is the last Gunslinger standing. He has a grave responsibility, it is up to him to prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demon's bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lord's son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: While driving with his two kids, a man receives a phone call from an unknown assailant who claims there is a bomb in the car. Unable to exit the vehicle, he must now follow a series of twisted instructions while trying to figure out how to survive.

programme.desc: Kraven's complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma, having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Nuclear Man, Lex Luthor's latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race and sees the android, which is made from Kryptonite, as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: A rogue insurgent assassinates foreign journalists and makes it look like the CIA is responsible. Coaxed out of retirement to clear the agency's name, a deadly operative must confront his checkered past while unraveling an international conspiracy.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: It's been nearly a decade since Tarzan, also known as John Clayton III, left Africa to live in Victorian England with his wife Jane. Danger lurks on the horizon as Leon Rom, a treacherous envoy for King Leopold, devises a scheme that lures the couple to the Congo. Rom plans to capture Tarzan and deliver him to an old enemy in exchange for diamonds. When Jane becomes a pawn in his devious plot, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Billie and Greg: The Family Diaries
programme.desc: As the kids' behaviour fails to improve, Billie and Greg wonder if their constant snacking could be a factor - however, when they attempt to fix the problem, the pair end up having to take drastic measures to stop them raiding the pantry. Elsewhere, Chatty celebrates his 70th birthday as the family try to keep his surprise party a secret from him while ensuring that people show up, and Billie jets off for a swimwear shoot in Marrakech that leaves Greg home alone on daddy duties with the kids.

programme.title: The Only Way Is Essex
programme.desc: The award-winning reality show's ninth series continues, following the Essex gang for more fun and frolics on their annual jaunt to Marbella. programme.title: The Real Housewives of Potomac
programme.desc: Mia reveals what she allegedly overheard on the phone with Karen years ago, leaving the table speechless; The ladies ring in Wendy's 40th birthday; Gizelle heads back to Maryland to attend Angel and Adore's cap-and-gown ceremony.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
programme.desc: Celebrating Teresa's bachelorette party, the ladies live it up by hitting a pub with the locals on their first night in Ireland; tensions are reignited between Danielle and Rachel when the rat is let out of the bag.

programme.title: Dinner Date
programme.desc: Luke from Southampton has the chance to dine with three potential romantic interests. When the three dinners are over, he must choose one lady with whom to go on a second date.

programme.title: Billie and Greg: The Family Diaries
programme.desc: Billie and Greg take the kids on an exciting holiday to Dubai, but it seems they're not able to escape their children's bad behaviour as they continue to act up in paradise - the family makes time for thrills and spills but also soak up some cultural traditions as Nelly and Arthur are treated to some one-on-one time and Margot has a messy bathroom accident.

programme.title: The Only Way Is Essex

programme.desc: Since 1980, this championship has developed Australia's best road racers as they aspire to follow in the footsteps of legendary riders such as Troy Corser, Mat Mladin and Anthony Gobert.

programme.title: Launch Control
programme.desc: Travis Pastrana has a change of heart after taking time off, returning to the Oregon Trail Rally. Back in Vermont, the team starts building Project Midnight WRX in preparation for Scott Speed's debut at Goodwood Festival of Speed.

programme.desc: A journey back in time to the very origins of drag racing; remastered archived footage with narration by Professor Jay Deez III bring these historical stories back to life again.

programme.desc: Dennis travels to the American Muscle Car Museum in Melbourne, Florida, and fires up the Alan Mann GT40.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles face a new challenge when Shredder escapes from custody and joins forces with Baxter Stockman, a mad scientist who plans to use a serum to take over the world. Along for the ride are Bebop and Rocksteady, two dimwitted henchmen who provide plenty of muscle. Luckily, the turtles have their own allies in April O'Neil, Vernon Fenwick and Casey Jones, a hockey-masked vigilante. As the pizza-loving heroes prepare for battle, the notorious Krang also emerges to pose an even greater threat.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April O'Neil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Look Who's Talking Now
programme.desc: In the third of the `Look Who's Talking' comedies, two dogs enter the Umbriacco household - and take an immediate dislike to each other. When Molly loses her job, husband James is forced to take on a demanding role as private airline pilot. The children miss him, so he buys a dog to cheer them up. However, when James's glamorous boss asks his family to look after her poodle, sparks fly between the dogs.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A ragtag team of international talking dog mascots must leap to the rescue of their teams and thwart the plans of some villains trying to sabotage the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before D'Artagnan's very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith team up to try to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden. When one of McGregor's relatives suddenly moves in, he's less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young farmhand gets swept into the realm of legend when he must defend his land from a seemingly unstoppable force of giant warriors.

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Bart's successful stage musical based on Dickens's tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: A Tiger's Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animal's mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tiger's Nest".

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith team up to try to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house while their mum is at work.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college friends decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends. One of them has a rival for the affections of his girlfriend as she is hit on by a wealthy playboy.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Elizabeth II and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the children's story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesn't go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her Māori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: The BFG

The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.desc: The Hoods are a group of kids who love to play fantasy games on a patch of land they call the kingdom. However, when plans emerge to develop the area into a leisure facility, they must find a way to save their beloved playground before it's too late.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens' novel, `Oliver Twist', as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her Māori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a séance for a writer suffering from writers block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

programme.title: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats' leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Jake reunites with his brother, Elwood -- collectively known as the `Blues Brothers'. Jake's first task is to save the orphanage the brothers grew up in from closing, by raising 5000 dollars to pay back taxes. The two are convinced they can earn the money by getting their old band back together. However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: A teenage girl wants revenge on the man who killed her father, but she needs help from legendary one-eyed marshal `Rooster' Cogburn, and a Texas Ranger.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Housesitter

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In 1960s London, an aimless, amoral young man exploits the women with whom he becomes intimately involved, until something happens to make him reconsider his existence.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJ's sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the man's quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million worth of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: The Cinema List: British Sky Originals
programme.desc: With a little something for everyone, discover a selection of British Sky Originals that includes 'Four Kids' and 'It' to 'SAS Red Notice'.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleone's 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his family's interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the family's seamier dealings. His descent accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million worth of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friend's killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unravelling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from 'Monster Family' to 'The Amazing Maurice'.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live' skit.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friend's killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unravelling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him 300 million dollars. To inherit it, Brewster must spend 30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Legendary pet detective Ace Ventura returns for another adventure when he's coerced out of retirement while on a soul-searching retreat in the Himalayas. He must now retrieve an endangered white bat from a village located in Africa. The sacred animal was offered up as a wedding dowry from the Wachootoo prince to the Wachati princess, and, if Ace can't track down the culprit behind the kidnapping in time, civil war will break out between the two rival tribes.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Forced to give up her own dreams while living on a tropical island, Eve Carver encounters a strange woman who begins to take over her life.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A young woman, her new boyfriend and her single mother embark on a sailing adventure to Bermuda. However, when criminals suddenly attack their boat, the pleasure trip turns into a desperate fight for survival and a quest for vengeance.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken family's history.

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original group's way of life.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in America's former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general and a colonel face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken family's history.

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: Chen Yutong, a girl's middle school student, was bullied at school, but her mother Li Han was unable to save her daughter from the "hell." Everyone around her turned a blind eye, and a collective silence brewed greater violence.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Angels & Demons

Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky

programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Debbie Ocean assembles an all-female team of thieves and specialists for a heist during the Met Gala, aiming for the $150 million worth of diamonds around the neck of world-famous actress Daphne Kluger.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Restless

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter, and a servant, forcing them to seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how it was committed.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, a Harvard symbologist is surprised to be approached by the Pope's emissaries for help. Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Debbie Ocean assembles an all-female team of thieves and specialists for a heist during the Met Gala, aiming for the $150 million worth of diamonds around the neck of world-famous actress Daphne Kluger.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who murdered five people, apparently at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of US soldiers.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a string of brutal murders terrorises London, it does not take long for legendary detective Sherlock Holmes and his crime-solving partner, Dr Watson, to find the killer, Lord Blackwood. A devotee of the dark arts, Blackwood has a bigger scheme in mind, and his execution plays right into his plans. The game is afoot when Blackwood seems to rise from the grave, plunging Holmes and Watson into the world of the occult and strange technologies.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: As rioting and civil unrest rocks Detroit during the summer of 1967, several policemen begin interrogating guests at the Algiers Motel. By the end of the night, three unarmed men are gunned down while several others are brutally beaten.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: For Dan Gallagher, life is good. He is on the rise at his New York law firm, is happily married to his wife, Beth, and has a loving daughter. However, after a casual fling with a sultry book editor named Alex, everything changes. Jilted by Dan, Alex becomes unstable, her behaviour escalating from aggressive pursuit to obsessive stalking. Dan realises that his main problem is not hiding his affair, but rather saving himself and his family.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Head Count
programme.desc: After escaping prison, Kat's own revolver is pointed to his head by an unknown assailant. As the empty rounds click away, he tries to remember what happened to each bullet.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his family's ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Barber
programme.desc: A wealthy widow hires private investigator Val Barber to find her missing granddaughter. As dark secrets start to surface, Barber finds himself entangled with shady and powerful men who are determind to thwart his investigation.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Magic Moments: Die besten Stunts von Danny MacAskill
programme.desc: Danny MacAskill begeistert seit Jahren mit kreativen Edits und spektakulären Stunts. Diese fünf Magic Moments zeigen, warum er zu den einflussreichsten Bike-Athleten der Welt zählt.

programme.title: Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen Belgien 2022: Highlights
programme.desc: Furchtlose Teams rasen in ihren motorlosen Maschinen über Hindernisse, aber wer wird in Spa den Sieg holen?

programme.title: A History of ... S1 E3: Ursprünge Freestyle-Motocross
programme.desc: In den 90er Jahren war die Ziellinienpeitsche ein Mittel, um nach einem gewonnenen Motocross-Rennen anzugeben, aber dieser Trick öffnete schon bald die Tore zu einer neuen Form: Freestyle-Motocross.

programme.title: Worldies S1 E14: 5 bizarre Events des Actionsports
programme.desc: Angefangen bei der Formel 1 über Klippenspringen bis hin zu allem, was dazwischen liegt - jedes dieser "Top-5"-Videos liefert die unglaublichsten Momente, Events und Athleten aller Actionsportarten!

programme.title: Jubiläumsauftakt von Red Bull Cliff Diving
programme.desc: Cliff diving returns to Athens as top divers leap into action at a stunning new spot, over three intense days.

programme.title: Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series 2023: Finals – Paris
programme.desc: Die Zuschauer:innen bekommen vor dem berühmtesten Wahrzeichen Frankreichs einen atemberaubenden Blick auf die Action bei der Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series 2023.

programme.title: 7 Alpengipfel in 7 Tagen: Weltrekord im Alleingang
programme.desc: Extremsportler Michael Strasser schreibt Geschichte: In nur 7 Tagen erklimmt er solo und ohne Hilfe die höchsten Gipfel der 7 Alpenländer – ein neuer Weltrekord im Grenzbereich des Machbaren.

programme.title: Premier Padel 2025 Miami P1: Highlights
programme.desc: Das Miami Premier Padel P1 wird 2025 zum ersten Mal ausgetragen und bietet spannende Action, wenn die besten Spieler:innen um den Titel kämpfen.

programme.title: Premier Padel 2025 Riad P1: Highlights
programme.desc: Der Saisonauftakt der besten Padelspieler beim Riad Premier Padel P1 in Saudi-Arabien. Ein Turnier, das den Startschuss für eine neue Saison voller Herausforderungen und spannender Matches setzt.

programme.title: Screenland S1 E4: Doku über iPad-Spiele für Haustiere
programme.desc: Im Gehirn von Indiespiele-Entwicklern: Diese Doku begleitet die Entstehung von iPad-Spielen für Katzen und dem Spiel „Butt-Sniffin' Pugs“, das von einem Ehepaar entwickelt wird.

programme.title: Rekord über dem Meer: Slackliner über Messina
programme.desc: Der Weltmeister im Slacklinen, Jaan Roose, plant einen Rekordversuch: einen 3,6 Kilometer langen Seiltanz über die Straße von Messina in Italien, 200 Meter über dem Meer.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush S4 E2: Slackline-Weltrekord Versuch
programme.desc: Profi-Slackliner Alex Schulz versucht den Highline-Weltrekord mit einer luftigen Traverse in China zu brechen.

programme.title: Die Clip Show: Extremkayaken in Südamerika
programme.desc: In dieser Clip Show geht's ans Limit: Mit dem Kayak über die wildesten Flüsse Chiles und ein Bike-Run von Brandon Semenuk – in einem Take, ohne Schnitt. Maximale Action, minimaler Atem.

programme.title: Doku
programme.desc: Tony Hawk, Jason Paul und Pasha Petkuns erzählen, wie sich Freerunning von den Straßen zur weltweiten Bühne entwickelte – und wie Red Bull Art of Motion zum Herzstück der Bewegung wurde.

programme.title: BMX Film: Go Fast Pull Up
programme.desc: Die Evolution des BMX von den 80ern zu den 90ern. Go Fast Pull Up wirft einen Blick auf das Leben des BMX-Fahrers Jimmy LeVan und seine Rolle in der Geschichte des Sports.

programme.title: Bike Film: Shires
programme.desc: Shires ist ein packender Bike-Film, der über zwei Jahre gedreht wurde. Er fängt die Essenz des Bikens in Großbritannien ein – mit Top-Athleten, epischen Trails, rauer Natur und unberechenbarem Wetter.

programme.title: MTB-Downhill: 20 Jahre Red Bull Valparaíso Cerro Abajo
programme.desc: Die Geschichte hinter dem größten urbanen Downhill-Rennen der Welt: Wie aus einer Idee unter Freunden ein legendäres Event in den Straßen Valparaísos wurde – voller Speed, Adrenalin und Geschichte.

programme.title: Abenteuer Doku: Mit dem SUP von Dänemark nach Norwegen
programme.desc: Casper Steinfath bereitet sich mental und körperlich auf eine extreme Herausforderung vor: Er will als erster Mensch die Strecke von Dänemark nach Norwegen auf einem Stand-up-Paddleboard bezwingen.

programme.title: Doku: Gabun Uncharted
programme.desc: Unberührte Natur, wilde Tiere und weit weg von jeglicher Zivilisation: Die SEND-Crew begibt sich mit einer Elite-Kajak-Crew auf das ultimative Kajak-Abenteuer auf dem Ivindo-Fluss.

programme.title: Reel Rock S10 E1: Solo-Klettern auf Mallorca
programme.desc: Reel Rock: Von alpinen Legenden und jungen Helden – das australische Kletterwunderkind Angie Scarth-Johnson und Hazel Findlay bezwingen Mallorcas spektakulärste Tiefwasser-Solo-Routen.

programme.title: Reel Rock S10 E2: Kletterwettbewerb auf Mallcorca
programme.desc: Angie Scarth-Johnson erkennt, dass der Psicobloc-Kletterwettbewerb nicht nur körperliche, sondern auch mentale Stärke erfordert – kann sie über sich hinauswachsen?

programme.title: Reel Rock S10 E3: Grenzerfahrung für blinden Kletterer
programme.desc: Der blinde Abenteuersportler Erik Weihenmayer stellt sich einer gewaltigen Herausforderung und will eine der imposantesten Felswände der Sierra Nevada erklimmen – schafft er es bis nach oben?

programme.title: Reel Rock S10 E4: Erstbegehung des Mt. Mizugaki

programme.title: Kletter-Film: Mit Angie Scarth-Johnson auf Kletter-Tour
programme.desc: Die australische Kletterin Angie Scarth-Johnson, mit 18 Jahren bereits eine Meisterin von 9a-Routen, hat noch viel vor. Ein Wunderkind der Kletterszene auf dem Weg zu neuen Höhen.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
